user: What is PAMM?
standard_answer:
he HFM PAMM Program is an investment solution that allows individuals (Investors) to allocate their funds to experienced traders (PAMM Fund Managers) who then trade the markets on their behalf.
Here is how it works:
A Fund Manager opens a PAMM account and allocates their own funds to it (known as the "Manager's Capital").
Investors can review the performance and rankings of different Fund Managers and choose one that matches their investment goals.
The Fund Manager then trades using their own capital and the funds from their Investors.
Any profits or losses generated are distributed proportionally among the Manager and all Investors.
If the Fund Manager generates a profit, they receive a pre-agreed "Success Fee" from the investors' share of the profit.
All investments and transfers are automatically controlled by HFM for security and peace of mind.
